intro: Drosanthemum pallens, commonly known as the pale drosanthemum, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. The plant is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and small, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of pink and white. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, showcasing its adaptability to drought conditions. Drosanthemum pallens is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and low maintenance requirements.
